TransactionType.name: Commitment
TransactionType.description: A firm written obligation by the donor to provide resources of a specified amount under specified financial terms and conditions and for specified purposes for the benefit of the recipient

TransactionType.name: Disbursement
TransactionType.description: The amount placed at the disposal of a recipient country or agency (in the case of internal development-related expenditures, the outlay of funds)

TransactionType.name: Expenditure
TransactionType.description: The outlay by the implementing agency on goods and services for the activity

TransactionType.name: Incoming Funds
TransactionType.description: Funds received from an external funding source (eg a donor).

TransactionType.name: Interest Repayment
TransactionType.description: The actual amount of interest repaid, including fees.

TransactionType.name: Loan Repayment
TransactionType.description: The actual amount of principal (amortisation) repaid, including any arrears.

TransactionType.name: Reimbursement
TransactionType.description: A disbursement that covers funds already spent by the recipient, as agreed in the terms of the loan or grant.
